Anything involving physical exercise was a challenge for Wanda these days.
With weeks of crushing Janet’s SoHo couch under her belt and barely a muscle moved due to her magic doing all the heavy lifting, the witch was not prepared for the journey to Avengers Tower.

But, after what felt like hours of forcing one thick thigh past another, the Romani brunette finally found the familiar automatic doors parting on the lobby of Avengers Tower.

Fortunately for Wanda though, New York was a city built on food carts, and
as she tired and her hunger swelled, Wanda was often greeted with another wheeled distributor of food.

Burgers and dogs
Sweet pastries
Ice creams

Wanda had had it all as she made her way to her destination and, as unhelpful to her situation that was, it had made the journey infinitely more pleasant. Now though, whilst enjoying the air conditioning with her hands full of her own belly, Wanda heard familiar voices behind her.

“Wanda? Is that you?” called out Sharon Carter, a glimmer of excitability in her voice in contrast to her fellow.

“I didn’t know you were allowed back yet, Maximoff” sneered Maria Hill.

Reluctantly cutting her belly rub short and forcefully tugging on her still unbuttoned jeans with a faint red mist, Wanda addressed the two women.

“Oh I just wanted to drop by, see how everyone is doing” purred the brunette as she composed herself before turning to face her colleagues.

“Well it’s so good to see you” smiled Sharon “and you look so good!”

Sharon wasn’t usually the bitchy type, Wanda recalled, but the comment about her appearance threw her.
That was before she caught a proper glimpse of the two agents.

Alongside Sharon’s usual characteristic pleasantness, Wanda also recalled both women being classically svelte.
That wasn’t the case now though.
Although both sported taut pot bellies under their formal office attire, the similarities split from there.

With a much sunnier personality, Sharon had a bounce in her step, or at least her ass, as great flaring hips accented her lower half and were accompanied by wobbling thighs and a heavily padded rear.
Her face also looked rounder as her flowing blonde locks framed plump cheeks resembling her thinner self.

Hill, on the other hand, possessed an all-round largeness that outweighed her colleague noticeably.
Although also bottom heavy like Sharon, Maria was heavier downstairs with an escaping bulge of belly fat rolling out of her button shirt and against her meaty thighs.
A full chest dominated her shirt, pulling it tighter than she cared to admit, and only accentuated the parting triangles down her belly.
In typical Maria Hill style though, the high ranked agent was stony faced even through the flushed look bathing her cheeks from walking and the tightness of her outfit suggested denial.

“If we’d have known you were coming you could have come to lunch with us” chirped Sharon, carefully placing a hand across the curve of her stomach.

Maria went to protest but found herself having to stifle a belch with a clenched fist instead.

“Maybe next time” smiled Wanda, feeling an almost warm sensation inside that felt similar to the friendship she had spawned with Janet.

“It’s a date, call us!” nodded Sharon before waddling towards the building lift “going up?”

“Yes actually” smiled Wanda as she slowly followed the two women in her own laboured waddle.

*PING*

“Ok, this is our stop” announced Sharon “some of the girls are in the gym on this floor if you want?”

Wanda considered this.
Although talking to a more senior member of the team may be better, getting some first hand info seemed just as helpful in seeing if there was any more concerning problems afoot with Janet’s sudden hunger.

“Sounds like a plan” mused Wanda, adjusting her jeans again.

“First left, big double doors ahead” grunted Maria apparently more occupied with rubbing her own distended belly that she now had on full display with her shirt pulled up.

“Thanks” replied Wanda, still bemused at the size of the two women who had joined her in the lift.

With a casual glance back, Wanda noticed just how much Sharon and Maria we’re packing in the back.
With her skirt straining to keep hold of her bloated rear, Sharon certainly had some movement with each step but Agent Hill was definitely the bigger woman as her pants looked fit to burst with strangling panty lines clear as day against the tailored material.

Wanda had no time to linger on that thought though, as loud cheering was echoing down the corridor towards her in the direction she was meant to go.

‘Sounds promising’ thought Wanda as she pounded down the hall in search of the voices.
They didn’t provide what the witch had expected though.

Although the word ‘gymnasium’ still stood proud over the double doors of the room, the women inside were doing less than intense workouts as Wanda approached.

“Wanda!” squealed the familiar voice of Jessica Drew who, after a stream of grunts and groans, came running at Wanda and swallowed her in a hug.
Run was an over-generous term for the arachnid hero as her bulging belly had dragged her towards Wanda.

“It’s been so long and you look amazing!” cooed Drew.

“Thanks?” replied a confused Wanda.
‘This definitely isn’t right’ thought Wanda, recalling the weeks of teasing that Jessica Drew of all people had thrown her way for her weight gain.
Now though, the same woman looked pregnant and then some again with a face coated in chocolate.

“Come on, you’ve got to eat with us!” shouted Drew as she waddled back from where she had come from, belly bouncing wildly with each step.
Wanda followed slowly with a feeling of unease as she looked over the other women before her.

Drew had just dumped herself back into a seated position allowing her belly to pool in her lap with a starved look in her eyes.
Jessica Jones, although equally fattened around her middle, possessed the largest chest Wanda had seen heavily resting on her stomach, stretching her T-shirt.
The emerald skinned beauty that was She-Hulk was quite a sight, silently inhaling food by the fist full into her ballooning hourglass figure with no sign of muscle on her thickened frame.

An unexpected face to one side of the crowd was Romanoff who, with a rapidly disappearing cheesecake in hand, looked like a swollen shadow of her former self, spherical and soft stomach perched on rounded thighs in a shockingly short vest top and panties betraying her decent into engorged gluttony.

As the other girls began to lift various food items to Wanda as she passed, her powers slowly scooping them up and bringing them to her mouth as they had done for weeks, an unexpected saviour announced itself over the Tower announcement system.

“Could the Wicked Witch of the Red please come to Lord Stark’s office, please” came the smooth tones of Tony Stark, quipping as usual in his summons.

“Aww damn it” groaned Jessica Drew through a mouthful of nachos “come back here once you’re done yeah?”

“Uh huh” nodded Wanda, opting to float herself back out of the room rather than turn her great pale mass manually.

‘Should have floated here’ complained Wanda in her head.

*****

“Hey Wanda, I’ve got a problem and I hope you can help” called out Stark as Wanda entered his office, catching her protruding belly with the door as she closed it.

“I hope so, I have a problem of my own” replied Wanda, finding a chair that groaned under her weight.

“I’m sure we can help each other” smiled Tony honestly “anyway, I’d dare say you are a fan of Chinese food right?”

“Yes?...”
Wanda was nervous as to what Stark wanted now.

“Well Pepper has got an insane craving for it lately and I wanted your advise”
With a few delicate swipes on his personal hologram, the billionaire brought up numerous shop fronts before flicking it into the space between himself and Wanda.

“Which of these takeouts would be the best investment if I was to buy it?” asked Stark, leaning back in his chair.

The question knocked Wanda back, she certainly hadn’t expected to be asked for an opinion given how she was hardly on active duty, even if the subject was in conflict with her original reason for coming.

“Well, if you ask me Chang’s is always a good bet, failing that Golden Wing is a personal favourite” mused Wanda whilst biting her plump lip softly.

“Wow, I never would have guessed those” mused Tony, eyes flicking with mental calculations.
“Ok well that’s great, thanks a lot Wanda” smiled Stark warmly “what can I help you with today then?”

“Well, it’s a bit tricky really, I...”
Wanda found herself cut off by the sound of Tony’s phone buzzing.
Instinctively, he swiped it up and read the received message quickly.

“Sorry, erm...you don’t happen to know a good Mexican as well do you?” asked the billionaire sincerely.

Wanda sighed before a deep seated stomach rumble disturbed her.
The sound didn’t go unnoticed by Stark.

“How about you, me and Pepper go get some lunch and we can do some proper research, yeah?”

Before Wanda could properly consider the question though, Tony was already ushering her out of his office and organising the collection of Pepper.

‘What is going on with people lately?!’ questioned Wanda, none the wiser to her original problem.
12211313211213221111121.title: Witch hunt...ing for answers

choices: Tony comes through and Wanda and Janet can come home, weight and all
Wanda influences, and is influenced, with food
Despite improvements, it doesn’t take much to put Wanda all the way back down
122113132112132211111211.content:
Needless to say, the drive from Avengers Tower was slightly awkward between Wanda and Tony.
They spent no time, just the two of them, together at the best of times and with Wanda’s mind elsewhere on everybody’s eating problems and Tony dealing real estate this was only weirder than could be expected.

“Slight change of plan Wands, apparently Pepp has got herself entrenched at some dessert place down town so we’re going to meet her there” announced Tony with an air of complete normality.

‘I have NEVER seen Pepper Potts eat a dessert’ thought Wanda, trying not to screw up her face, not that Tony would have noticed.

“Next left Happy, just drop us round the corner” requested Stark, leaning forward to address the driver.

“You got it boss”

As the car turned, an array of brightly coloured and neon lit signs came into view and it suddenly dawned on Wanda WHICH dessert parlour they were going to.

“Thanks again for the help back there with the Chinese places by the way, Pepp’s been through the roof hungry lately” declared Tony with a genuine appreciation in his voice.
That was unsettling enough, never mind everybody’s weight gain.
“Yeah, erm...no problem” replied Wanda weakly, trying to curtail her own ‘through the roof’ hunger to no avail.

*growl*

Tony chuckled.
“Of course, I don’t need to talk about hunger with you, talk about preaching to the converted”

Wanda felt like the comment should have stung but it actually didn’t.
Was she starting to understand Tony Stark’s ridiculous sense of humour?
God help them all...

“Anyway, here we are” mused Tony as the car came to a halt “I’ll call when we’re done Happy”

Happy simply nodded in the rear view mirror as Stark stepped from the car.
Wanda was less delicate in her departure as the whole car rocked and groaned on its suspension as the bloated witch stepped into the street.

“Do you know this place?” asked Tony as he headed towards the entrance to Wanda’s FAVOURITE dessert parlour, Sugar and Ice.

*****

As the two heroes entered the parlour the sweet, almost sickly, smell swept over the pair.
Whilst Tony nearly staggered back out of the eatery, Wanda began salivating on the spot.

“Hey there, what can I get you...Wanda? Hey there girl!”
Wanda had to smile a little as the waitress addressed her, after all, she’d been there enough times to get friendly with the staff.
“Your usual table then?” smiled the chubbIER hostess as she rounded the counter.

‘She’s put on weight too?!’ thought Wanda, taking a glance around the parlour and realising that every female customer also looked larger then she recalled.

“Actually no” interjected Tony “we’re meeting Pepper Potts here”

“Tony?” called out a familiar voice, the sound of which immediately elevated Tony’s mood.

“Hey hon” smiled Tony as he closed the gap between them immediately, embracing Pepper tightly.

“burp...ooph, hey” purred Pepper with a radiant half smile “could I get a refill please?”

“Sure thing Potts” responded Tony with a wink as he parted from his partner.

“Hey Wanda, how are you?” asked Pepper with a slight turn towards the bulbous brunette.

“Good thanks, you?” returned Wanda politely, sensing she knew the answer already.

“I’m well” smiled Pepper with an almost coy laughter following.
She certainly looked well in one form or another anyway and she apparently knew it.

All her usual decorum was set to one side it seemed and, in lieu of her usually sophisticated formal attire and suits, Pepper was dressed like any girl struggling to fit in clothes with a clinging long sleeve T-shirt and sweat pants to boot.

As Janet could testify to from her visit weeks before, Pepper was definitely a little bottom heavy. Now though, she was less ‘little’ and more ‘heavy’ as, even in her sweats, the plumpness of her ass was clear in size and shape. Her thighs even looked to be doing their best to fill her sweats.

As far as ill fitting clothes choices went though, her shirt was definitely behind the curve, looking painted on to her thick double belly with every inch betrayed by tightness.
A bulging muffin top crowned her hips looking ready to pour out over her waistband whilst a larger chest was betrayed by clear cup lines across her front and cutting strap lines around her sides.

“You hungry then Wanda coz I am starving” purred Pepper, cradling her belly as an angry growl escaped indicating her hungry status despite already tackling any number of desserts before her company had arrived.

Wanda knew deep down there were bigger things at play, but this place was her kryptonite, and she wasn’t footing the bill for once...

*****

“I know I’m a billionaire and all that but I’m kinda glad I only have to keep one of you girls fed” mused Tony as another empty tray was taken from the table in time for another to replace it.

“Oh you’re fine sweetie” purred Pepper, grabbing a large sundae dish of gelato and a dinner plate sized brownie piled with ice cream “I do your accounts remember?”

Tony nodded with a smirk, of course she knew.

On the other side of the table sat Wanda who, despite best intentions, had eaten her fair share and, like her red headed accomplice, didn’t appear to be slowing down any time soon.

“Thank you Tony for all this” smiled Wanda with ice cream splattered across her full lips, the characteristic food swarm swirling her brunette locks and periodically flying to her mouth.

“You are most welcome Wanda, any time” replied Tony without any hesitation “it’s good to see you’re doing better now”

‘Better’ seemed a strange term with her doming belly on show but she could accept the compliment.

“And if you want, I can have a word with the powers that be and see if we can get you reinstated at the tower” suggested Tony almost in passing, only with eyes for Pepper as she glutted down more and more food.

Wanda stopped still, food included at the revelation.

“What, really?”

“Yeah totally, everyone is happy to see you and your mood is improving drastically so I don’t see why not” announced Stark “I can but try anyway”

“Wow” muttered Wanda to herself “that would be pretty great”

“And we can do this way more often!” beamed Pepper after swallowing a large bite of brownie.

“That WOULD be great” smiled Wanda, resuming her own eating at that point.

“Well leave it with me and I’ll see what I can do” asserted Tony “now, do you ladies want some dessert?”

“We’ve been eating dessert for the past hour Tony” glowered Pepper with her trademark stare.

“Oh yeah, never mind then”

“Nono, i’ll go for some more” pleaded Pepper, stifling a burp as she leaned against Tony, her fuller belly rolling out from under her overtaxed shirt for the first time and resting against Tony’s leg.

“Well if you insist” teased Tony before standing “Wanda?”

The witch pondered for a moment, almost reluctant given how much she had already eaten.
That said, she really couldn’t resist even if she tried.
Not that she did.

“Sure, if that’s ok” purred Wanda.

Tony just nodded before heading off to order again.

Watching Tony walk off, Pepper straightened herself in her seat with a warm smile placing both hands on her middle and softly squeezed her belly.

“Feels good doesn’t it?” cooed Pepper, biting her lip a little.

“Hmm?” grunted Wanda, mouth full of ice cream again.

“Being full, feels good doesn’t it?” repeated Pepper, a touch more sultry tone in her voice the second time.

Wanda hadn’t really thought about it before, despite spending weeks on end being full, but now given the chance to think about it...

“Yeah...yeah it does” returned Wanda with her own smile.
122113132112132211111211.title: Bottomless Potts

choices: The more Wanda lives in this world, the more she really starts to like it...
Seeing no other option, Wanda tries to magically shift things back to normal...
1221131321121322111112112.content:
On the one hand, it was probably good for Wanda to be getting around again.

That was what Janet had wanted for her, right? To be social and talk with her fellow Avengers, to hobknob with the other superheroes between crises that threatened to tear reality apart? To take a load off and decompress after the stressful life of a superhero had taken its toll? In all honesty, Wanda was more surprised than anyone that she found herself socializing with the super circle after she’d slipped so precariously close to the deep end (yet again) with nothing in the way of repercussions.

But instead of her getting back on the same page as everyone else—as her hiatus from heroism was meant to do—it had done quite the opposite. Instead, it seemed like the world had aligned itself with Wanda since she’d been gone! Tummies bulged and spandex squealed as the figures of femme fatales around the globe seemed to swell and swell at an uncontrollable pace. Appetites grew in line with the bellies that filled them as figures widened and BMI’s soared! Wanda’s hunt for answers would take her to every corner of the marvelous universe if it had to!

Provided that there were lunch breaks, of course.

***


“It’s so good to see you up and around again, Wanda.” Sue Richards’s chubby cheeks bunched, her blue eyes shining as she skewered a piece of sushi with her chopsticks, “I’d heard that you weren’t doing so hot from the grapevine and, well—”

“I assure you, Mrs. Richards, I am feeling wonderful.” Wanda fumbled with the chopsticks a bit

The extra-dimensional cuisine made from ingredients that could only be found in the labs of one Dr. Reed Richards had seen to improving Wanda’s mood tremendously. Leave it to Mr. Fantastic himself to find the most wonderful ingredients in the universe. Or the next. Or the space between universes… Sue was one lucky woman.

“That’s good—Reed was certain that there was a chance of you… altering reality or something.” Sue scoffed, her chipmunk cheeks rolling against her double chin, “Honestly, he’s such a worrywart.”

Sue grunted as she leaned into her stomach, her pretty face creasing in mild frustration as she struggled against her incredible bulk. Frowning all the way down into what looked like a third chin, Sue began to sweat as her hammy arms trembled under their own atrophy and weight.

“allow me, mrs. richards.” said one of the many flying drones that buzzed about their dining area

“Thank you H.E.R.B.I.E.” Sue puffed weakly, settling back into her Thing-sized dining chair with a husky grunt, “Wanda, can I get you anything?”:

“No thank you—I can get it myself.” Wanda smiled, coating the Negative Zone’s finest sushi in a bright red glow and hovering it over to her mouth.

“Well if you change your mind, just talk to one of Reed’s robots.” Sue took one hand from her meal and gestured to the veritable swarm of H.E.R.B.I.E. drones piddling about the room—mostly providing seconds for what was already looking to be a rather promising meal—“I dare say they’re even better hosts than I am.”

Sue laughed and rested a hand on her gigantic stomach as it poured towards the floor, rubbing an acre of it affectionately as she resumed her dinner.

In hindsight, the fact that she’d come to Sue Richards to ask whether or not she’d noticed anything strange about the other women on the Avengers roster seemed pretty silly. Looking at her, she was perhaps one of the most changed women of all! All belly, practically pinned to her seat and treated like a queen by hovering robots, dining on the finest cuisine that any universe had to offer…

Wanda didn’t know if she was more confused or jealous!

***


Her father might not have liked the idea of his daughter dining with the X-Men—truth be told, she never really much cared for the lot of them. Any time she got involved in X-business, it never ended well for her.

“I suppose we have gotten a bit lax with our training regime.” Ororo said with a pointed little grumble as she ran her hand up her swollen belly, “But I assure you—nothing is any stranger in here than it is out there, Wanda.”

The fact that she was saying this, wedged in the doorway to Headmistress Pryde’s office, caught by the swell of her monstrous hips, did little to instill Wanda with hope. She had done plenty of business with the weather witch in both of their long, long careers, and she had always been a pillar of self control! But seeing her like this… sporting a set of thunder thighs loud enough to make Thor blush… it was concerning.

“I will be happy to let you out… so that we may begin our…” Storm squeezed futilely at the brown bulge of her blubber as it poured over either side of the doorway, “Luncheon! Just as soon as…”

“No need, Ororo.” Wanda rolled her eyes, waving her hand along the big black canvas that was Storm’s bottom half, “I think I can manage a bit more favorably than you have.”

The section of the wall that had caught Storm’s saddlebag thighs shone a bright red before crumbling into plaster. The thick bootied mutant felt her chunky legs settle back into place with a quick, unsightly waddle that left her face burning in embarrassment.

“Yes. Well. Thank you.” Storm sputtered, “Perhaps now we might get a bite to eat? I’d we make haste—for some reason, Rogue has been unable to shake the Blob’s infernal appetite for some time now…”

***


“Hey Quill, turn the krutakin’ music down—“ the talking Raccoon said off-screen, “—Have we noticed anything weird in space?”

“Weird is a subjective term.” A gruff, buff-looking man in the corner said to his knives, “For instance—there is a large woman in a red tiara on our communications feed.”

“That’s not so weird.” The raccoon shrugged

“You two, shut your pieholes.” Said their captain (and the only person Wanda recognized and was less weirded out by), “What’s up, Avengers?”

Wanda grimaced—her dimples making her round face look that much chubbier. No small amount of vanity had kept her from hosting a full-body communication. She had known that the Guardians weren’t exactly professional, but she didn’t quite like the fact that she’d been identified as a large woman with nothing but her face to go on.

“Some of our heroes have been acting… strangely.” Wanda rumbled, “Have you noticed anything strange outside of Earth’s orbit?”

“You’re lookin’ out here for strange?” the raccoon popped back into the screen at the corner, “Is that burger behind your head floating?”

Wanda paused, furrowed her brow, and cut the feed—she should have known it was a lost cause before she even called up the Guardians of the Galaxy.

A-holes.

“Great, thanks a lot, Rocket.” Star Lord smacked the bipedal critter across the head, “That was our one shot to figure out if anyone had seen Gamora on Earth.”

“Hey, it’s a big universe, okay?” Rocket glowered, “And at the rate she’s goin’, it’s not like it’s gonna be all that hard to find her.”

“Statistically speaking, the longer we wait, the larger a target we have to search for.” Drax looked up from his knives, “Not to mention slower, and more likely to stop for snack breaks.”

“I AM GROOT.”

“No we are not body-shaming Gamora!” Rocket rolled his beady eyes, “Like Drax was sayin’, just… you know, discussin’ probabilities!”

“I AM GROOT.”

"Yeah yeah, we've heard it all before... the things trees think are sexy... yeesh"
1221131321121322111112112.title: Finding Answers, Finding Room...

choices: Janet and Wanda live the life of Riley, eating and eating and eating
A fattened villainess becomes an unexpected friend
Somebody else has worked out the problem, but what do they do with it?
12211313211213221111121121.content:
“Did you ever get that thing sorted you wanted to ask Tony about, Wanda?” asked Pepper as she sat herself back in her seat, fingers splayed over a broad, exposed belly as she licked ice cream from her lips.

“Huh?” grunted Wanda as she continued to wolf down her large helping of cheesecake, brownies and pie.

“Tony said you wanted his help with something the day we had lunch here” reiterated Pepper, shuffling her bloated hips slighting causing her swelled chest and belly to wobble uncontrollably for a moment.

Wanda thought for a moment before recalling that day.
“Ohh, yeah, it’s just I’ve been noticing some strange things happening and I wanted...”

“Can I get you ladies anything else today?”

Wanda’s thought process was cut off by the sudden appearance of Stacey, their regular Sugar and Ice waitress, and the beckoning grumble of Pepper’s hungry stomach.

“Just in time Stacey” purred Pepper, subconsciously licking her lips “could I get three dozen muffin tops, two quarts of triple chocolate fudge, one of cookie dough and one salted caramel please?”

“Absolutely” smiled Stacey before looking to Wanda “anything for you Wanda?”

Before Wanda had chance to respond, Pepper cut in for her.

“She’s definitely ready for doughnuts and I would bet she’d go for another cheesecake, right?”

Wanda desperately wanted to say no having already devoured a huge amount of food but she was hardly in control of her cravings at the best of times, never mind in Sugar and Ice.

“Coming right up!” chirped Stacey before heading off to gather their order.

“You didn’t have to do that” insisted Wanda as she looked to her eating buddy.
Even though she and Janet hadn’t moved back to Avengers Tower, Wanda had maintained regular visits with Pepper, in part to sample restaurants for Tony to hoover up but also they found they enjoyed each other’s company.
A company that was proving fatal to their respective waistlines...

This was true wherever Wanda seemed to go these days though, and she only saw more as she tried to dig deeper into her investigation of everyone’s sudden weight gain.

Jane Foster and destroyed a bench under her vast bulk when Wanda had gone to find answers from her, given her Asgardian connection, only to discover that Lady Sif had been appointed the Goddess of Feasting with the Valkyrie warrior caste falling in line as her followers, gluttony and all.
Wanda couldn’t help herself from thinking that Foster seemed to have fallen in line with such a deity as she had left the good doctor glutting herself without restraint.

With a slight change of tact, Wanda had opted to visit Doctor Strange and, although he proved to be as normal as any other man these days, he also reported that all women bound to a sanctum was gaining weight across the world.

Even Stacey who, to the best of Wanda’s knowledge, possessed no superhuman abilities, was gaining weight quite spectacularly with a thick roll of belly fat on display today and a blossoming chest stretching her work shirt to its limits.

“Don’t mention it” purred Pepper in response to Wanda’s pitiful dismissal of food “the stuff here is too good to miss out on, right?”

‘She wasn’t wrong’ thought Wanda, hungrily licking her own lips without realising as their food approached in the arms of their fattened waitress.

*****

“So I tell her, whoever pops the least targets pays for lunch” explains Sharon Carter whilst two-handing a thick burger into her mouth, grease glistening on her lips and cheeks “and that’s how big shot Agent Hill over there came to pay for my lunch!”

The blonde’s goading tease fell by the wayside though as Maria Hill was far too concentrated on stuffing her own face like she’d never eaten before even with both women sat as a clear testament to the exact opposite of that sentiment.

In keeping with her early gains, Carter’s face had continued to fill out unlike most women that Wanda had come into contact with, and was deep in double chin territory with plump flushed cheeks to match.
Her arms were thicker as well as her waist, which was rapidly disappearing under layers of fat, but was most noticeably bottom heavy with great bulges of hip and ass fat squeezing out of the gaps to the sides of her chair.

Having started with a sizeable set of hips, Hill’s dimensions had ballooned immensely and, along with her exploding appetite, her whole figure had grown outwards.
Completely unashamed, or just lacking care entirely, Maria sat with her shirt unbuttoned and cast down her vast sides allowing her spherical belly to bulge out and rest against the table the three women shared.

Her lacy black bra was barely containing her swollen breasts atop her gut whilst her skirt showed signs of tearing up each thickened thigh.
Maria’s rear spread unrestricted, having realised she was too big for the chairs that Sharon currently occupied and opting for a more open bench, showing just how wide the senior agent was.

“Anyway, what did you want Wanda?” asked Sharon politely as she rotated onto a huge steak piled high with chips.

Wanda had to think, her own eating almost slowing as she considered why she had called this lunch meeting with the two agents before her.
She knew it had been important but all she could think about was how delicious all this food had been and how much fun she was having with her present company.

Before she could catch herself, Wanda found herself answering in a way that seemed more honest then she realised.

“I just wanted to have lunch with you guys” smiled Wanda as she returned with gusto to her own plateful of sliders.

Sharon smiled her own plump smile whilst Maria continued to pig out, all manner of ladylike behaviour lost as the dark haired agent brought a plate of pasta to her waiting mouth and poured it in.

*****

Wanda had to honestly admit that she was actually really enjoying her life at the moment, more so than she ever recalled before.
Even if she was spending her days eating to her hearts content whilst all her friends (because they truly were her friends these days) did the same, Wanda found she didn’t care as the happiness far outweighed that concern.

Although a great number of people had helped her come to this conclusion, there really was only one person who Wanda could be truly grateful to and that was her roommate.

*click*
“I’m home Janet” called out Wanda as she stepped into the SoHo apartment that she shared with The Wasp.
Although it could never compare to the swaths of technology back at Avengers Tower, or even the luxury they had there, the apartment had become home and Wanda wouldn’t have it any other way.

“Great!” shouted the familiar hyperactive voice of Janet van Dyne from the living room the pair shared “have you got the food?”

Wanda laughed, it still knocked her sideways slightly hearing Janet’s enthusiasm being pointed at food so distinctly even after all this time.

“I have some of it yes, the rest will be up in a moment” mused Wanda as she opened a nearby window ready to allow the rest of the first wave of food into the apartment as she floated it up the side of the building.

“Thank god because I am starving” cheered Janet.
Wanda would have found it easier to believe if Janet hadn’t clearly been speaking through a mouthful of food at that moment.
As a hero known for her ability to shrink, Janet was also a ways off being a starvation risk.

After weeks convincing Wanda to drop some weight and her then sudden change in attitude that has sparked Wanda’s now waiting investigation, Janet had become one of Wanda’s biggest bad influences with her electric charisma and sudden gluttony bundled up into one huge pear shaped bombshell.

Ever fashion conscious, Janet was clad in an outfit that wouldn’t have gone amiss in a gym comprising of three quarter length leggings and a cropped workout top, not that she had seen a gym any time recently.

As she awkwardly twisted her vast hips to avoid getting caught in the kitchen door, Janet waddled towards the sofa with each step causing a great ripple of fat to roll through her enormous arse cheeks as the tight grey material was unable to hold her in place.

Her exposed belly, spilling over her waistband, also jiggled wildly with a deep belly button situated in the middle of two wobbling rolls making up her thickened trunk, although they were no match for the width of her hips despite swallowing her former tiny self without question.

Janet carelessly dropped herself heavily onto one of the degrading sofas in the living room with a resounding scream from the springs as the hem of her top disappeared under her growing chest whilst she glamorously kicked her chubby toes onto the other seat.
The action allowed her to recline heavily into the full length of the couch with her sides bunching into rolls of fat whilst her wobbling rear spread gently off the open side of the sofa much to Janet’s internal pleasure.

As hunger washed over her, Janet messily tied her hair back into a pony tail that slid between her shoulder blades, the motion giving Wanda an eyeful of her friends arm fat wobbling away as she formed the hairstyle whilst the witch deposited boxes of food into her lap.

“Best roommate ever!” declared Janet before diving into the food before her.

Wanda laughed, depositing herself on her own couch as she also tucked in.
This really was the life she had craved for, even if it was much fatter than she had anticipated.
12211313211213221111121121.title: Welcome to the strange

choices: As Wanda continues to accept her new reality, it just gets stranger and stranger
122113132112132211111211211.content:
For all the irony that it’s worth, Wanda had long considered herself the unluckiest woman on Earth.

Given her powerset of probability manipulation, one would have thought that it would have been just the opposite. But despite all of the misfortune that seemed to follow her around—the same misfortune that had sent her spiraling in and out of deep depressions over the course of her life and career as a superhero—the Scarlet Witch had found herself feeling contented for the first time in a long time since she’d donned her shiny red tiara.

The time spent with her fellow, former, and frequently feasting friends would do well to dull the slowly softening voice in the back of her mind that told her something wasn’t quite right. The way things were now, through the influential lenses of a collective appetite and laziness, slowly became the new normal. As Wanda dipped her chubby toes into the swelling social circle of softening superheroines, she found that she rather liked how things had changed while she was away.

Now she had a nice apartment, a wonderful roommate, and plenty of friends to hang out with. She hardly had to worry about keeping the world… or even New York safe anymore! She was free to do whatever she wanted, without any of the stress or judgement that used to weigh so heavily on her shoulders.

This was the life she wanted—no, the life she deserved all along!

And after she’d put her suspicions to bed, she found herself having a much better time…

***


“Float me!”

Janet VanDyne held her mouth open, double chin creasing deeply along her swiftly vanishing neck. Her plump lips parted and shone red as Wanda’s magic worked a slice of pizza towards the wonderfully weighty Wasp as she lay on the couch. As the greasy, cheesy triangle from 51st made its way past her lips, she took the smallest lean forward and took a heaving bite.

“You like?” Wanda asked, easily juggling an entire buffet orbiting across the room, “Do you now understand why I use my powers in such a way?”

“Your powers are so fucking broken it’s ridiculous.” Janet huffed, scarfing down her slice in record time as another took its place, “Reed’s been working on a power sampler—don’t suppose you’d be interested in shrinking down to less than an inch tall?”

“Not on your life.” Wanda tittered, cheeks jiggling, “Now open up.”

Janet laid back and let her body run on autopilot—it knew what to do. Admittedly, it felt strange to not have to move her arms. As they hung uselessly at her side, Janet found her chubby little hands cradling her stomach as a lazy river of greasy New York takeout found its way into her belly…She could understand Wanda’s newfound habit of resting her hands on the top of her belly. It felt so natural—so right.

“More.” Janet grunted

“If I fed you any faster, you’d explode.” Wanda sniffed, “Use your hands, you lazy little bug.”

“Oh come on, you said you’d feed me!”

“And I did—you’re just a little piggy.” Wanda stuck out her tongue

“Wanda!” Janet whined, “I’m hungry!”

Wanda ignored her roommates pleas, shifting heavily on the groaning couch beneath her. She leaned on one of her elephantine hips, struggling to wriggle her way to a more comfortable position. She grunted, heaving like a hog in heat as she struggled against the weight of her own sandbag stomach. Even using her magic, it was hard to find a comfortable angle. Her belly started to sag off of the couch no matter how she sat now, and it could get a little unpleasant.

Dressed in a pair of gray sweatpants and a large red t-shirt (the Avengers logo distorted to fit the curvature of her colossal left boob) Wanda couldn’t have looked more lazy. Her thick brown hair up, Wanda’s face was crowned with a thick hanging double chin that met along the crest of her cheeks. Her proud, prominent Romani features were buried under ample amounts of pale ivory chub—her superior, haughty nose and the pinkness of her chipmunk cheeks made her look that much more like the pig she’d become through and through.

And as she reclined on her couch—stomach sagging low, and drooping off of the side, she reclined like royalty as her probability powers pampered her in every way that she deserved.

“You pig.” Janet huffed as her jetstream of calories died down, “Couldn’t you at least try to pretend you want to share?”

“Ugh, fine.” Wanda waved a useless, chubby hand as the orbit around Janet increased, “Are you happy yet?”

Janet couldn’t speak, she was too busy alternating bites from this meal and that.

But Wanda took her throaty moans of pleasure as a resounding “yes—more please!”

***


As time went on, it became clear to even the most skeptical of superheroines (if there had been any left) that the mysterious expansion that had gripping them all wouldn’t vanish as quickly as it had occurred.

In Wanda and Janet’s apartment especially, there was a constant and steady influx of food. There was an almost constant influx of food going into one stomach or the other, in the most literal fashion that such a sentence could be expressed. Between Janet’s habit of sleep-eating and Wanda’s habit of sleep snack-pilfering from the world down below, some days were a literal constant barrage of food.

Two globular cheeks stretched a pair of black and yellow sweatpants thin, shiftling slowly and uncontrollably beneath their thick padding. Janet’s back rolls wobbled with every thudding step as she lumbered around the apartment. Her fat belly poured out from over the waistband of the biggest pair of sweatpants the fashionista had ever owned, rolling in a pale roll of blubber that bobbed with every heaving step. Her hair was up, and her makeup was off—a sure sign of another “girl’s day”

Her hand came to rest tenderly beneath her belly—she hefted a sizable portion of it up.

No more diets

It rang over and over again in her head, echoing in the back of her mind. Janet had just loved the idea of giving in and letting loose. It had been so much fun. She needed it. She deserved it! Every pound, every inch, she had earned them all through years of tireless Avenging and saving the universe. Being the Wasp was hard work after all—it was only right that she get to reward herself…

“I think I’ll order a little something extra for myself…” Janet drooled as she fumbled with her phone—fat fingers pushing incorrect buttons…

"After all... it's not like I'm on a diet or anything..."
122113132112132211111211211.title: Heroic Appetites

choices: Wanda soon finds herself outweighed in this world she unintentionally created...
Wanda manages to get bigger than ever, quickly becoming the World's Widest Witch
Wanda's guilt leaves one heroine untouched, who vows to whip her into shape!
1221131321121322111112112111.content:
Reality is often a strange thing—Wanda, being who she was, had learned to accept that from a young age.

Given the probability manipulation powers that had been bestowed upon her, she had seen some pretty strange things over the course of her life. So much so that, when things were often at their strangest, she hardly felt phased. Perhaps, even when she should have.

Unfortunately for Wanda’s deeply buried senses of logic, reason, and moderation, the sensation of having her hips brush against the doorway to her apartment had failed to register as unusual to her. In this new world of indulgence, gluttony, and appetites run amok, the only thing that she felt was slightly uncomfortable.

“Gee Wanda—we’re gonna have to have you cut back!” Janet said playfully as she watched her roommate struggle in the doorway, “You’re getting kinda porky!”

Of course, she’d said this while wrist-deep in a bucket of takeout fried chicken. The idea that anyone in this world that Wanda had (inadvertently) created would even consider a diet was laughable. Janet was only teasing in a way filtered by Wanda’s wreckless need to indulge would allow her to. She grabbed a palmful of Wanda’s billowing belly blubber as it sagged towards the floor, and gave it a good shake.

And Wanda—bottomless as she’d allow herself to become—took it in great stride. A simple wiggle of her fingers, and the doorway was widened.

Why hadn’t she been using her powers of probability in such a way before?

It was as if, all of the sudden, all of Wanda’s problems had melted away. As soon as she’d accepted the strangeness that was her newfound reality (and given the strangeness of her old reality, that was really saying something!) things seemed so much clearer!

Why struggle?

Why work hard?

Why not indulge?

Everything that she’d ever wanted in life was coming true. She was happy, she was content, she had circles of friends that invited her out every hour of every day. More importantly, she was hungry!

Wanda’s subconscious was running rampant, synapses firing in the presence of all this immediate gratification. Her pleasure centers were out of control entirely as she worked her magic (literally and figuratively) on every bite of food she could get her grubby little grabbers on.

No more… she’d whisper to herself, hovering barely an inch over her bed, No more diets…

With every casting the spell grew more and more intense, further changing the world around her until it better matched with what she subconsciously desired.

The very concept of diets faded from the minds of women world-over, until all that was left was a desire to indulge mindlessly, shamelessly, and endlessly. The world changed to suit her needs, the world changed to the dancing steps of her chubby little fingertips, twitching as she slept hanging heavily in the air.

No more diets she repeated endlessly, food floating around her, No more diets no more diets no more diets…

As the madness mantra left her lips, Wanda’s eyes rolled. A familiar sensation overcame her, deep within her pillowy thighs. Electricity spiked, traveling up her spine as her breathing became shallow and hoarse. Her tongue lolled out as her thighs clenched tightly together.

“Yes…” she panted, as her base desires shaped her mental frame, ”Yes…”

Her arms far too short (or rather, her belly far too big) for her to appease herself traditionally, Wanda’s edible orbit began to take flight into her mouth. Still sound asleep, she began to change the world once more.

“No more diets…” she mumbled through bite upon bite of gratification, her spherical shape doming in the eye of an edible storm as her subconscious desires took hold…
1221131321121322111112112111.title: Brave New World, And Such Gluttons in it!

choices: Wanda makes sure both women are plentifully fed
The whole moment is interrupted by something unexpected
12211313211213221111121121112.content:
“Hey Wanda, did we order lunch yet?” asked Janet, doubling down on a large burger in each hand with grease dripping down her first chin.

“You’re eating it now Jan” replied Wanda, obviously delving into her own food in the kitchen.

“Oh yeah” giggled the brunette as she continued to inhale her third meal of the day.
It was 10am...

In truth, this was what the girls would consider a slow day as there had, in fact, been pauses in their eating although that said little with regard to the huge quantities each woman had consumed in the few hours they had been awake.

Not that sleep slowed Janet’s unyielding hunger.

Between her own efforts, her penchant for sleep eating AND Wanda’s relaxation on feeding her by magic, Janet was becoming less and less relatable to her trademark super powers.

That wasn’t to say that the woman formerly identifiable as The Wasp hadn’t used her Pym Particle powered abilities, she had found a great deal of enjoyment in shrinking down and gorging on full sized food, but her physique was anything but ‘shrunken’ at this point.

Her dominating pear shape only became fuller by the day as Janet’s constant intake of calories only increased much to her own delight.
Janet’s vast rear ballooned out behind her like a rounded canvas, tightly clad in tortured leggings that were stretching more transparently around her hips.

Her belly had bloomed tremendously with her hunger and, as one wobbling mass, bulged over her strained waistband with a delicate cleft forming in the middle of her hanging middle.

Although exceptionally proud of her enormous rear, Janet had to admit she had a soft spot for her burgeoning belly, often fondling it’s mass whilst Wanda lazily fed her from across the room.

Janet wasn’t without other assets though and, although less so, her chest was large enough, her thighs tapered into her hips and her flabby arms wobbled with the slightest movement.

“Shouldn’t we be ordering lunch round about now?” asked Janet again, licking her fingers clean as she dug into a family sized bag of chips, wiggling her hips slightly into the barely surviving sofa.

“The usual Stark supplies will be here soon dearest” purred Wanda with a patronising tone, not that Janet was paying attention.

“Yay!” cheered the huge pear, almost bouncing clear of her seat causing her perch to complain loudly as her vast bulk gyrated upon it.

Although the agreement was never officially defined, Stark had taken it upon himself to supply the ladies of the SoHo apartment with a regular influx of food from the numerous take out establishments he had taken ownership of in the name of feeding Pepper.

*knock knock knock*

“Yay!” shrieked Janet actually standing up this time and donning a pair of flip flops as if the nakedness of her chubby feet would be the shock factor to the delivery person.

With the delicate sound of flipping and flopping, Janet’s great rear quaked like an enormous bowl of jelly whilst her belly shook in great swaying wobbles as she came to the door, whipping it open almost swiftly for her size.

“Come in, come in, we’re starving!” cooed Janet nonsensically having already eaten more that morning than her thin self would have consumed in a week.

As a parade of takeout bags and boxes came into the apartment Janet hungrily licked her lips, eagerly inhaling the smells before her as her stomach began to cry out again.
She truly was insatiable these days, but she had earned that luxury.

Janet’s moment was interrupted by the soft throbbing of her holo-comms which she instinctively answered.

“Morning Pepper” cooed Janet with a hint of playful teasing as the redhead flashed into the room in almost realistic imagery, clear enough at least to show that she was eating furiously.

“Morning Jan...BUUURP!” belched Pepper as she finished her deep fried burrito, grabbing herself another six into her fattened arms before sucking them down into her plump face.

“So sophisticated” teased Janet again, rubbing her belly as she attempted to quell her hunger for the duration of the call.

“Girl’s gotta eat you know” purred Pepper before seeming to glance behind Janet “JOCASTA! Be a sweetie and bring me some more burritos would you?”

The faintly robotic response came from behind the projection making it muffled but Pepper’s smile indicated the response was positive.

“Anyway, is Wanda there?” asked Pepper, patting her vast two tiered stomach as she continued to inhale burritos interspersed with whole slices of chocolate cake.

“She should be through, the smell is enough if she’s gone deaf since I last spoke to her” smiled Janet as she heard movement in the kitchen “and here she comes”

For all that Janet had sped through dress sizes, Wanda was a whole different entity.

Whilst Janet are in her sleep, Wanda had taken to gorging constantly, particularly after her epiphany in her bedroom and things had been quite extensive from there.

Although her powers would certainly allow it, Wanda took some delight in walking around when she could, and the small trip from the kitchen to the living room was one such trip for the greatly engorged witch.

With great puffed cheeks, Wanda’s fuller but recognisable face appeared in the doorway, her hair actually done in an almost reminiscent style of bouncing curls, it was apparent just how much of an impact her epiphany had had.

Truth be told, Wanda was practically spherical aside from a sizeable indent around her waist where remnants of figure could be argued.

As was to be expected with Janet as a roommate, fashion had changed for Wanda and, after a great deal of searching, Janet had acquired a huge pair of sweats that were hiked up over Wanda’s great belly hang almost to her hips, concealing her belly button and restraining the great mass of belly leading her walk.

Unsurprisingly, her thighs had thickened to great proportions due to staying on her ass for weeks on end, but her calves had also become fatter, merging into ankles and equally fat feet which heavily trudged forward.

“Come on Wanda, I am starving!” groaned Janet as she resisted reaching into the nearest bag barely.

“I know Jan, I’m coming...hey Pepp” grunted Wanda as she felt her momentum halt.

“Hey hun, you look so good!” cooed Pepper with a hint of yearning whilst cramming more food into her face.

“You’re telling me Potts, she eats so much more than me” complained Janet with a faux tone.

“Very...funny...” grunted Wanda again, suddenly aware of a great pressure around her hips and noticed the doorway had once again halted her.

“Aww no, you stuck again babes?” purred Janet with a wry smile as she eyed her roommate pawing at the doorframe whilst her huge gut bulged against the door and her sweats in great fat rolls.

“I’m gonna leave you girls to it, need all your concentration getting a woman THAT big out of a hole that small” announced Pepper before closing off the call just as Jocasta appeared on the edge of the screen, laden with a mountain of fried Mexican food.

“Tut tut Wanda, I think we really are going to have to start cutting you off just a little” teased Janet as she sashayed towards Wanda, snatching up a bucket of chicken as she passed the pile of food in the middle of the room.

“I doubt you could if you tried” groaned Wanda, pushing against the door.

“True” spoke Janet, her mouth full of greasy chicken “wouldn’t mind trying though”

“I’m sure” retorted Wanda with a touch of bite, still stuck but hungrier than ever.

“Well I’m gonna start eating if it’s all the same to you” purred Janet, tossing her now empty bucket to one side and sweeping another and a large pizza to replace it.

“Hmm” grunted Wanda as her eyes flickered red, a half dozen cartons of Chinese food popping open allowing it to float towards the trapped witch.

“No fair!” complained Janet through a mouthful of cheesy bread.

Wanda smirked as she opened her mouth lazily, chewing on the torrent of noodles swimming into her mouth.
Janet looked to her friend as the flow of food passed her lips and she couldn’t help but notice the way Wanda’s belly dominated the doorframe she was stuck in.

“Crazy how...HUGE you are Wanda” mused Janet and, without thinking, she grabbed Wanda’s belly with both hands and kneaded the doughy mass.

Wanda instinctively moaned at the touch and her food stream sped up as her eyes rolled back slightly.

“Oh you like that huh?” cooed Janet playfully as she squeezed more fat in her own chubby fingers.

Wanda’s moaning only intensified with her food stream whilst, unexpectedly, a second followed close behind, circling Janet’s head and delivered itself between The Wasp’s full lips.

“Ooph Wanda” cooed Janet, not relenting in her grouping of her roommates belly “you’ll make us BOTH fat doing this”

Wanda’s eyes rolled back more at the comment which only seemed to increase the pace of food pouring into Janet’s mouth, silencing her in the process.

As both women mindlessly ate the food floating into their mouths, one groping the other as she was trapped in the doorframe, silence fell over the flat aside from the sounds of eating.
Whilst Janet gorged in food euphoria, Wanda was on a whole different level of enjoyment which made the moment the doorframe snapped open a few more inches enough to allow Wanda through even more surprising for both as Wanda came crashing down on top of Janet.

Chewing, winded and squashed together, things could only go one way...

122113132112132211111211211121.content:
Probability, and the manipulation thereof, is a strange thing.

Imagine, if you will, a deck of cards. Every time you draw a card, you remove one out of fifty-two possibilities from the stacked odds. This is probability, and Wanda’s powerset means that she is in all but complete control of what card rises to the top when the need arises. What’s more, with a little application of her uncanny abilities, she can remove any and all cards from the deck that don’t suit her needs. So, to put it plainly anyone with Wanda’s abilities as the Scarlet Witch would have the ability to, for all intents and purposes, play blackjack with the deck face-up, and to be able to remove any cards that they didn’t want in play.

Ever since this dietary travesty had begun, Wanda had been slowly pulling two’s and three’s from the deck in play. Getting rid of things that didn’t suit her, like restraint and willpower. Soon the four’s and five’s came in the form of judgment, were removed from play, followed by the fives and sixes, until all that she was left with was a royal family in every suite and an ace to match—in essence, Wanda had slowly but surely been stacking the deck so that the universe around her catered to the pleasure centers of the brain.

And now that immediate gratification had all but encompassed the increasingly strong impulses of her mind—food, fat, and the female form were all fair game. Her complicated feelings towards her own rapidly expanding, increasingly (and exceedingly) spherical shape meant that Wanda was just as ready to appreciate the softness of Janet VanDyne’s lips as she was the softness of her hips. Or of her belly. Of her arms. Her inner thighs…

The long and short of it was, what Wanda wanted, Wanda got—and that meant that she and Janet had just kissed.

The feeling had been long building within Wanda’s subconscious. The conflicted feelings towards her own fat, combined with her piggish desire to eat and continue to eat with reckless abandon, had manifested themselves as some complicated feelings towards her own rapidly and outrageously expanding body. Her innate desire to feed meant that she would only continue to grow, and soon that had been enough. With every bite, every pound, her subconscious self equated her girth with beauty. And so, too, had everyone else. As the world expanded around Wanda, she came to feel far more at home with the super-sized superheroines than she had with their skinny minny counterparts.

As for Wanda… well, it had been a long time since she and Hank had divorced. She was due a little action.

“Oh my God.” She panted, “Wanda, I… I am so sorry.”

“No, just…” the Scarlet Witch gasped, out of breath as her mind worked faster than it had since this whole debacle began, “I… I want to…”

The two fat women proceeded to lock lips once more. Wanda pressed herself as hard against the smaller woman as she could manage. Their collective weight left Janet—who’d been squished by the weighty witch—breathless until Wanda decided to roll onto the hardwood floors of their SoHo apartment.

What followed was a confusing, but satisfying affair between the two “retired” superheroines. Hands traced ludicrously fat forms, rubbing acres of flab and squeezing handfuls of jiggling jelly as they came to terms with what was occurring.

The Wasp and the Scarlet Witch were making out.

Two incredibly out of shape, more or less unrecognizable versions of them, but the point still remained.

“You…. You’re a very good kisser.” Wanda said finally, parting from Janet’s plump pink lips breathing heavy, “I… I am surprised that you… find me attractive.”

There was an audible pause. Wanda lifted one heavy arm to jiggle a handful of her stomach as it poured over Janet’s less sizable (but no less elephantine) shape

“Like this.” She added with a self-hating grimace

“You know… me too.” Janet concluded with a little nod, wrapping her arms around Wanda’s neck and bringing her close, “But… I’m not saying no.”

The two of them would continue their little love fest on the floor for a good ten minutes. Before long, Wanda’s magic was well at play in hoisting the two of them up without a hint of effort, making it all the more easy for either of the weighty duo to waddle behind closed doors to act on their sudden, instinctive attraction to one another…

***


“You’re going to make us both too fat to be superheroes.” Janet panted, her turgid stomach rising high into the air

“We are already too fat to save anybody.” Wanda rubbed her roommate’s stellar stomach as it struck high into the air, “Without stopping to catch our breath a few times, at least.”

“Good thing we’re retired.” Janet burped as a hoagie floated dangerously close to her mouth, coated in red Hex magic, “Or else Cap would make us run laps.”

“Oof. I can’t imagine.” Wanda purred, running her hands up and down her own stuffed stomach, “Perhaps you can—imagine me all hot and sweaty.”

“Stop.”

“Panting, out of breath.”

“Wanda, this is…” Janet bit her plump bottom lip ,”Unfair.”

“I am simply too fat to do anything.” Wanda whined, “I can practically feel myself getting thinner by the minute!”

Janet laughed, jiggling her most recent sexual conquest by the swollen stomach.

“You’re ridiculous.”

“Ridiculously hungry.” Wanda laughed emptily, her cell-phone floating over to the bedside table, “What’s say I order us a little… celebratory snack?”

1221131321121322111112112111211.content:
“Thanking you for coming on such short notice Guardians!”
Cosmo the Space Dog’s voice penetrated the minds of the four guardians descending the ramp of the Milano simultaneously with a happy dog face filling his helmet, contrary to the message that had summoned them to Knowhere.

“No problem” grunted Quill, his mind elsewhere as he drew level with Cosmo, the remaining Guardians some way behind “what was the big deal you needed us back so urgently for?”

“Ah yes, as head of security of Knowhere it is my jobs to notice any strange happenings and...”

“I am Groot!” came the echoing tones of the resident tree from behind Quill.

“What are you talking about Groot?” barked Rocket with a slight snarl “I think I speak for everybody here when I say...far more politely than I want to...we’re all getting a little tired of your fat fetish!”

“He’s right Rocket, the women here are enormous!” interjected Drax, bluntly as ever

“What the hell...” muttered Star Lord under his breath as he took a decent look around.

Diverse as ever, the halls of Knowhere were filled with people of any great number of races and, as so delicately put, every single woman present was indeed fat.

“This is problem Star Lord, women are gaining weight at alarming rate and Cosmo know not why” complained the space dog, his brow almost appearing to furrow from the quandary at hand.

“Well news flash for ya mutt, people are getting fat all round the universe and ain’t nothing we can do ‘bout it” declared Rocket, pushing past Quill’s legs to address Cosmo directly.

“Well I hope you brought some food with that attitude” purred a familiar voice.
Instinctively, the team looked to the holographic display that had flickered into life and produced the voice now addressing them only to find most of their jaws hitting the floor.

“Danvers?!” spat Rocket, gawking slightly at the mountain of woman digitally presented before him.

“The one and only” smirked the blonde “unless you know any other supercharged chicks as ravishing as this”

To prove her point, Carol did a slow turn showing off her engorged form from her jostling belly hanging down her cellulite dappled thighs to her titanic rear that barely fit on the screen.

“You got anything for me then?” purred Danvers leaning into her own screen, filling it with her fattened face and a valley of cleavage threatening to pour out of her too-small shirt.

“Better have something for me too” groaned a second voice as a great bulging belly of green brushed against Carol’s face, signifying Quill’s moment of shock.

“Gamora?!”

“Yeah, now get me something to eat” grunted the green skinned love interest of Star Lord’s heart as her own fattened figure lumbered into view.

Despite being smaller then Carol, it was clear that Gamora was as addicted to stuffing her face as every woman seemed to be these days, and the former assassin’s physical superiority was long gone beneath vast rolls of flab.

From her face full of chins to the wobbling hams she called arms, Gamora was a woman of gluttony now, even down to the hunger in her eyes as she massages her burgeoning sack of two tiered belly fat as Star Lord stood and watched.

Whilst Quill continued to look bemused, the faint sound of a door opening cut through the screen audio followed by excited clapping.

“Ohhh Gamora, Mantis is back with more food and...”

“Eaaaaaaat” purred the empath, placing a hand on Carol’s belly out of shot before depositing a great spread of food before the blonde.

“Urgh, this is the life” groaned Carol, the sound of eating already distorting her voice as a pale hand stretched around Gamora and groping her belly as the sweet word ‘eat’ followed the action.

The guardians could only look on in shock as the two supersized women settled into yet another gorge, whilst Mantis tucked into her own feast with her own substantial girth on show.

“See Guardians? Problem” reiterated Cosmo.

*****

“Asgardians!” bellowed the former Lady Sif over the great feast gathered before her “I, your Goddess of Feasting, demand that you indulge yourself completely senseless in my honour!”

The exceptionally short speech was met with raucous cheering before every woman present threw herself back into her gluttony. To see Asgard so indulgent was quite a sight, even by their own standards, but after four days of constant feasting there were signs of tiring.

Great piles of discarded feast ware and expanses of exposed flesh were indicators enough but that did little to halt the merriment amongst the women of Asgard.

“You look a tad full, oh feasted one” came the gentle voice of Brunnhilde, head of the Valkyrie’s and, amongst other things, Sif’s current lover.

Sif laughed at the comment as she cradled her engorged belly.
“I’m not the only one” she teased, planting a light swat against the blonde Asgardian’s exposed thigh.

“True” murmured Brunnhilde as she stifled a burp “you have made your people happy”

“These aren’t my people Brun, I only ensure they eat in these fattening times” glared Sif as she tore into a great bird’s leg with juices dripping down her chin.

Brunnhilde glossed over the correction as she watched her lover devour the meat, biting her lip as she did.
“Then allow me to ensure you eat in these fattening times”

Sif glanced with a much more affectionate look this time as she watched the bulging blonde clamber on top of the table before her, heavily dropping her arse on the golden surface so as to face Sif herself.

“Now just relax m’lady” purred Brunnhilde, flicking her blonde plaits over her shoulder before delicately taking an entire serving tray of hog from the table in one arm and feeding Sif with the other.

“Umph, you are so dutiful” groaned Sif as she pulled apart her robes to expose her great belly, a sight that spurred Brunnhilde on in her doting.

“Anything for you” cooed Brunnhilde, using her Asgardian strength to drag Sif’s great chair closer until her belly rested between the blonde’s fattened thighs.

“Then allow me to return the favour” cooed Sif in return and, with slightly glazed eyes, heaved herself to her feet causing her great belly to sit mostly in Brunnhilde’s lap.

“But I am the follower...” protested the blonde and Sif pushed against her, allowing her weight to force the smaller woman down onto her back as she awkwardly climbed on top of her.

“Then be quiet and allow the gift of a Goddess to indulge you” responded Sif mockingly as she pressed her weight into Brunnhilde before forcing a great fistful of meat into the blonde’s mouth.

Unable to speak, the warrior turned acolyte simply tugged at her own robe to expose her engorged hourglass shape, allowing the two lovers to touch skin to skin in their moment of intertwined gluttony.

Were these less gluttonous times, such a display at the head table of a feast may have caused a scene, but with everyone preoccupied in their own food or romantic twists, no one cared for the two obese women frolicking so publicly.

“Should we not go elsewhere?” panted Brunnhilde, a stickler for decorum at the best of time as she continued to swallow food presented to her.

“No” announced Sif, allowing herself a heaping handful of food as she spoke we are right where we need to be”

With that, Brunnhilde awkwardly wiggled her hips slightly with an alluring smile as she allowed the moment to just happen to her as the night continued to roll on by.

“Your majesty, the queen is awake” came the husky voice of Okoye.

“Hmm, thank you Okoye” grunted T’challa as he rose from the elegant seat at the back of the room and began to cross towards his military lead.

The woman nodded curtly as she lent awkwardly on her spear whilst hooking a wedgie out.

T’challa, meanwhile, couldn’t help but smirk at the sight
“Just don’t” glared Okoye as she straightened herself and turned, beginning a slow trudge into the corridor outside the throne room.
“Oh I wouldn’t dare” teased the African king as he drew level with and then, with some playful force, punched Okoye in the meaty ham like arm.

The former general grumbled under her breath as her thick arm wobbled from the punch, much like the great wobble coursing through her thighs, rear and heavily hanging belly as the pair made their way through the palace.

“I notice you have been enjoying the new food” continued T’challa on his teasing nature.

“Shut it” grunted the huge woman, far past her prime of wielding a spear at this point “I can still run you through”

“Oh I am sure” smirked the king “you know, my sister would be able to get you measured up for a...”

Okoye knew exactly where this was going.
“I will NOT ride one of those mobility scooters your sister has invented!”

“Well you are more than welcome to one if you change your mind” teased T’challa again as two women approached donning badly fitting Dora Milaje uniforms.

“General, the morning feast is prepared” purred Ayo with a coy chew of her lip to the unanimous sound of three hungry bellies.

“Already?” grunted Okoye.

“I know, isn’t it...delicious?” smiled Ayo again.

“Urgh, fine” relented Okoye with a glance to T’challa.

“I’ll be fine Okoye, do not starve on my account”

Okoye rolled her eyes before meeting with her soldiers, one either side of the superior as the threesome waddled away to indulge again.
As lacking decorum as it may have been, Okoye had to admit her enjoyment as Aneka, the third soldier in the group, took to kneading a handful of belly fat escaping the general’s uniform.

Meanwhile, with a playful smirk plastered across his face, T’challa pushed the grand double doors open before him to greet his queen.

“Good morning, my love” proclaimed T’challa as he crossed the room to the chorus of gluttonous chewing.

“Mhm, gu’mor...*burp* guuth m...BEEEELCH...mhm”
Since arriving in Wakanda and becoming betrothed, Ororo Munroe really had come on in both appetite and girth.

As the weather mutant gorged on the vast mountain of food within flabby arms reach of her own larger throne, T’challa relished in the gluttony before him.
With her bulbous arse squeezed between and bulging over the arms of her seat, Storm was oblivious as her luscious brown belly hung between vast cellulite covered thighs.
Bulging breasts perched on her belly struggling within the confines of an overstretched white dress that parted down her front, leaving all BUT her chest exposed to the room.

T’challa was in heaven as he ogled his queen stuffing herself senseless again, chins and figure jiggling with every slob inspired bite.

*****

“Hurry up sis, I am WASTING AWAY!” shouted Medusa as she hunkered into a nest of her own crimson hair.

“I doubt that VERY much” teased Crystal.

“You don’t know that” grumbled Medusa as she rubbed her angered stomach, a prominent roll of fat bulging out past her pyjama shorts and top as the Inhuman queen fondled the pale skin in her chubby fingers.

“Oh I’m coming” sighed Crystal as heavy thudding steps indicated her return.

“Oh thank god” salivated Medusa as she wiggled in her ‘hair nest’, moving slightly and spreading the extent to allow for her sister to climb in beside her.

“You’re a peach” smiled Crystal as she managed to seat herself, great hips taking up more space than Medusa had anticipated causing her to will her hair even further than she expected.

“Why do I always have to get the food anyway?” asked Crystal as she divided up the spoils.

“Because you have the power to keep it all just at the right temperature and...*munch*...you know I can’t be trusted on collecting with THIS hair”

Crystal had to laugh at that one.
On the first (and only) occasion that Medusa had collected food not a single morsel had made it back to Crystal, with only crumb tangled strands of hair to explain where their entire evening’s plans had gone.

Honestly though, both girls were guilty of such gluttony, even if they weren’t to blame.
Inhumans have incredibly powerful metabolisms after all.
Not that that seemed to be slowing anything down.

For all the girth around her hips, Crystal wasn’t without some weight above the waist making an impressively full hourglass figure.
Full being the operative term for the strawberry blonde’s great rear peach and eye watering sweater stretchers.
Her waist was rapidly expanding into thick love handles as a squashed two-tier belly was inching out day by day.

Alternatively, Medusa fell into a category of a much more belly dominant persuasion.
With the majority of her weight settling around her waist and bulging over any waistbands the crimson haired queen managed to squeeze into, Medusa was apple shaped with an apparently genetic rear to rival her sister.
Even with a belly making downward motions to her dimpled knees, the red headed sister possessed little volume upstairs (beside her hair of course) but after some sisterly squabbles she’d learn to live with it.

“So what’s the plan tonight sis?” cooed Medusa as she curled her feet into her backside, hair curling away so as to avoid tangles.

An answer was far from forthcoming though as Crystal was far too busy tilting a great tub of ice cream to her lips, adding enough elemental energy into the chocolate flavoured dairy to melt it into her mouth.

Medusa chuckled.
“I like your style sis” crooned Medusa as she grabbed for a huge mixing bowl of just cooked enough cookie dough.

*****

“And that is what a I call a meal...BUUUUURPt” purred Felicia, voice dripping in arousal at her own mighty belch as she massaged her engorged belly, the tidal wave of stretch mark riddled flab surging out of her black cat onesie.

“Well I hope you’ve all enjoyed watching me devour the entire menu from Alfonzo’s tonight, because I’ve certainly enjoyed doing it...”
Felicia’s mind wandered as she reminisced on what she had literally just done, licking her plump lips in euphoria, massaging her belly even more.

“...mhm, anyway, don’t forget to tune in in 3 hours when I’ll be seeing how much cheesecake I can pack in here”
As she spoke, Felicia clumsily used the open flaps of her onesie to lift her belly and heavily dumped it on the desk where her camera was mounted, causing the whole setup to shake violently as her belly spread on the surface.
“Stay fat kitty cats!”

The enormous white haired streamer closed off by flicking up her onesie hood, showing off her cat ears with locks of hair billowing out around her plump cheeks as she slowly blew a kiss to the camera.

“Urgh, Felicia Hardy is fricking hot” came one lazily excited voice

“Yeah she is a bit...” came the second.

“Is there any pizza left MJ?”

Mary Jane Watson awkwardly looked around to no success.

“Nah Gwen, you ploughed through that ages ago” replied the redhead.

“Damnit” grunted Gwen Stacey as she propped herself against the sofa from her place on the floor “good job we ordered more like 20 minutes ago huh?”

“I’ll say” smirked MJ “you trying to eat as much as Felicia tonight?”

“Pfft, I wish” retorted Gwen hungrily, daydreaming as she drummed on her own stomach as it bulged over the top of her denim shorts with a line of drool shining her lips.

“Gwen? Gwen! The pizza’s here!” shouted MJ, breaking through to the blonde next to her.

“Huh, what?”

“Food babe, go get” shortened MJ, her own hunger gnawing.

“Right, on it” replied Gwen as she pulled herself to her feet causing a ripple of fat to shake through her bloating body.
MJ watched as her friend sauntered to the door, fattened hips swaying, rolls of back fat creasing, cleavage bouncing...
‘She would look good as big as Felicia...’ thought MJ as the smell of pizza wafted in towards her ‘mind you...’
Nostrils flaring, MJ groped her own ballooning midsection as she imagined her own engorged figure with her widened booty the only thing outmeasuring her belly
‘...I’d look pretty hot that size too’

“Put yourself down hun otherwise I’ll eat all this myself” grunted Gwen through a greasy mouthful of pizza, sides bunched in sweaty rolls.

“Hmm? Oh yeah” purred MJ, sliding a box her way and placing the hot delight in her lap, about to bite in when...

*PING*

“Score!” screeched Gwen as she grabbed her belly as it poured onto her thick thighs “button popped!”

‘Damn...’ thought MJ, biting her lip rather than her pizza

“Hey, don’t we have an ep of van Dyne’s vlog to watch?” asked Gwen, filling her cheeks with pizza again

“I think so” replied MJ, reaching for the tv remote

“Awesome, keep us going til ‘Fat Cat’ tonight and Janet is pretty fit too”

“Sure is” nodded MJ as she clenched her fat thighs together at the thought.
